snippet: Concerns about aggressive mountain goats have led the United States Forest Service to temporarily close the Scotchman Peak Trail.
abstract: Idaho's Scotchman Peak Trail is temporarily closed due to threatening mountain goat behavior; hikers offer them food, which in turn causes them to behave aggressively in attempt to get more.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about aggressive mountain goats have led the United States Forest Service to temporarily close the Scotchman Peak Trail.

headline.main: Idaho: Hiking Trail Closed Because of Aggressive Goats
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Hiking Trail Closed Because of Aggressive Goats
